entries.title: Scoped AdSense to Content Pages
entries.details: AdSense now loads only on research and policy content, with canonical metadata updates to reduce duplicate URLs.

entries.title: Added Research Articles
entries.details: Published long-form analyses for EMA Crossover, Parabolic SAR, Volatility Breakout, and the Arena scoring methodology.

entries.title: Added Research Hub and Homepage Entry Points
entries.details: Research index, featured article highlights, and new Learn the Method section on the homepage.

entries.title: Added Policy and FAQ Pages
entries.details: Expanded About/Methodology plus Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, and FAQ pages.

entries.title: Added 1 Mean Reversion Strategy
entries.details: Ultimate Oscillator added. Total strategies now 70.

entries.title: Added MR-15 Ultimate Oscillator
entries.details: Ultimate Oscillator mean reversion using multi-horizon buying pressure.

entries.title: Added 1 Mean Reversion Strategy
entries.details: Detrended Price Oscillator added. Total strategies now 69.

entries.title: Added MR-14 Detrended Price Oscillator
entries.details: DPO mean reversion using a detrended price oscillator.

entries.title: Added 1 Mean Reversion Strategy
entries.details: TRIX Reversion added. Total strategies now 68.

entries.title: Added MR-13 TRIX Reversion
entries.details: Triple-smoothed EMA momentum extremes for mean reversion entries.

entries.title: Added 3 Trend Strategies
entries.details: Coppock Curve, Elder Triple Screen, Vortex Indicator. Total strategies now 67.

entries.title: Added TREND-18 Coppock Curve
entries.details: Weighted momentum curve for long-term trend timing.

entries.title: Added TREND-19 Elder Triple Screen
entries.details: Multi-filter trend system combining MACD, pullbacks, and breakouts.

entries.title: Added TREND-20 Vortex Indicator
entries.details: Vortex indicator crossovers for trend entries and exits.

entries.title: Added 3 Trend Strategies
entries.details: Triple Moving Average, Linear Regression Channel, Darvas Box. Total strategies now 64.

entries.title: Added TREND-13 Triple Moving Average
entries.details: Three moving averages confirm trend direction before entries.

entries.title: Added TREND-14 Linear Regression Channel
entries.details: Regression channel breakout with mean-reversion exits.

entries.title: Added TREND-15 Darvas Box
entries.details: Box breakout strategy using rolling highs/lows.

entries.title: Added Risk Contribution Analysis
entries.details: Portfolio Builder now breaks down marginal and percentage risk contribution per strategy.

entries.title: Added 5 Advanced Strategies
entries.details: Volatility Regime Strategy, Momentum Crash Protection, Cointegration Basket, Flight to Quality, MACD+RSI Filter. Total strategies now 61.

entries.title: Added VOL-13 Volatility Regime Strategy
entries.details: Switches between trend following (low vol) and mean reversion (high vol) based on volatility regime.

entries.title: Added MOM-11 Momentum Crash Protection
entries.details: Momentum strategy with drawdown-based position scaling to protect against momentum crashes.

entries.title: Added STAT-11 Cointegration Basket
entries.details: Multi-asset spread trading using rolling regression weights for mean reversion.

entries.title: Added MACRO-03 Flight to Quality
entries.details: Switches to safe haven assets during equity market stress based on drawdown and volatility triggers.

entries.title: Added COMBO-02 MACD + RSI Filter
entries.details: MACD crossover signals filtered by RSI to reduce false signals in choppy markets.

entries.title: Completed Strategy Comparator
entries.details: Comparator now enforces 2-5 selections, adds a shareable URL button, and highlights best/worst metrics.

entries.title: Added Similar Strategy Recommendations
entries.details: Strategy detail pages now surface similar strategies based on tag overlap and return correlation.

entries.title: Added Benchmark Selector
entries.details: Strategy detail pages now support switching between Buy & Hold, SPY, 60/40 proxy, and Risk Parity benchmarks.

entries.title: Enabled Walk-Forward Optimization
entries.details: Backtests now use rolling train/test windows with parameter tuning, while falling back to baseline results if WFO underperforms.

entries.title: Published Membership & Roadmap Preview
entries.details: Homepage now highlights the planned membership tier and priority roadmap items.

entries.title: Expanded Instrument Coverage
entries.details: Added commodities (DBC, SLV, DBA, UNG) and crypto pairs (BTC-USD, ETH-USD) for broader comparisons.

entries.title: Added 5 Macro & Factor Strategies
entries.details: Accelerating Momentum, Dynamic Hedge Pairs, Cross-Asset Momentum, Risk-On/Risk-Off, Multi-Factor Composite. Total strategies now 56.

entries.title: Added MOM-10 Accelerating Momentum
entries.details: Multi-period momentum with short-term emphasis and weighted composite scoring.

entries.title: Added STAT-10 Dynamic Hedge Pairs
entries.details: Kalman Filter-based dynamic hedge ratio estimation for pairs trading.

entries.title: Added MACRO-01 Cross-Asset Momentum
entries.details: Uses lead-lag relationships between asset classes for allocation.

entries.title: Added MACRO-02 Risk-On/Risk-Off
entries.details: Switches between risk assets and safe havens based on composite risk signal.

entries.title: Added FACTOR-05 Multi-Factor Composite
entries.details: Combines value, momentum, and quality factors for portfolio allocation.

entries.title: Added 5 Risk & Regime Strategies
entries.details: Stop Loss Overlay, Trailing Stop, Volatility Risk Premium, Trend+MR Hybrid, Volatility Regime Switch.

entries.title: Added RISK-03 Stop Loss Overlay
entries.details: Universal stop loss with cooldown period overlay on trend strategy.

entries.title: Added RISK-04 Trailing Stop Strategy
entries.details: ATR-based trailing stop that locks in profits during trends.

entries.title: Added VOL-10 Volatility Risk Premium
entries.details: Harvests volatility risk premium when implied > realized vol.

entries.title: Added COMBO-04 Trend + MR Hybrid
entries.details: Buys pullbacks in uptrends using RSI oversold signals.

entries.title: Added REG-14 Volatility Regime Switch
entries.details: Adapts position sizing based on volatility percentile regime.

entries.title: Fixed Low-Trade Strategies
entries.details: Optimized MR-07 Hurst Filter, COMBO-01 BB-KC Squeeze, SUPER-01 Supertrend, MR-12 MFI to generate more trades.

entries.title: Added 5 New Strategies
entries.details: MACD Strategy, Aroon Indicator, Chandelier Exit, Williams %R Reversion, Money Flow Index Reversion. Total strategies now 47.

entries.title: Added Export Tools
entries.details: Export strategy equity data to CSV, download charts as PNG, and generate comparison reports from the comparator.

entries.title: Added TREND-12 MACD Strategy
entries.details: Classic MACD crossover system with 12/26/9 parameters.

entries.title: Added TREND-16 Aroon Indicator
entries.details: Trend strength indicator measuring time since highs/lows.

entries.title: Added TREND-17 Chandelier Exit
entries.details: ATR-based trailing stop trend system from recent highs.

entries.title: Added MR-11 Williams %R Reversion
entries.details: Oscillator reversion using Williams %R oversold/overbought levels.

entries.title: Added MR-12 Money Flow Index Reversion
entries.details: Volume-weighted RSI mean reversion strategy.

entries.title: Added Portfolio Builder
entries.details: Build weighted multi-strategy portfolios with presets and performance metrics.

entries.title: Added Correlation Matrix
entries.details: Visualized return correlations across strategies for the selected instrument window.

entries.title: Added Rolling Metrics
entries.details: Rolling Sharpe, volatility, and beta charts added to strategy detail pages.

entries.title: Added Category View
entries.details: Grouped strategies by category with ranked lists per instrument window.

entries.title: Added Site Favicon
entries.details: Browser tab icon now uses icon.png.

entries.title: Added Favorites Watchlist
entries.details: Save strategies to a local watchlist, track the count in the nav, and manage selections from the Favorites page.

entries.title: Added Dark Mode
entries.details: Toggle between light and dark themes. Preference saved to localStorage.

entries.title: Added Monthly Returns Heatmap
entries.details: Visual heatmap showing monthly returns by year on strategy detail pages.

entries.title: Added Drawdown Chart
entries.details: Peak-to-trough drawdown visualization on strategy detail pages.

entries.title: Enhanced Homepage with Multiple Leaderboards
entries.details: Added 4 strategy leaderboard charts: SPY 1Y, SPY 5Y, GLD 1Y, EURUSD 1Y.

entries.title: Added 10 New Strategies
entries.details: Risk Parity, Min Variance, HRP, Ichimoku, Adaptive MA, HMM Regime, Drawdown Control, BB-KC Squeeze, Turn of Month, Stochastic Reversion.

entries.title: Added KC-01 Keltner Channel Breakout
entries.details: ATR channel breakout with EMA midline.

entries.title: Added ADX-01 ADX Trend Filter
entries.details: Directional filter using ADX and DI thresholds.

entries.title: Added SUPER-01 Supertrend
entries.details: ATR-based trailing trend signal with band flips.

entries.title: Added SAR-01 Parabolic SAR
entries.details: Stop-and-reverse trend system with acceleration factor.

entries.title: Added HMA-01 HMA Crossover
entries.details: Fast/slow Hull MA crossover trend model.

entries.title: Added CS-01 Cross-Sectional Momentum
entries.details: Monthly cross-sectional ranking with volatility-scaled weights.

entries.title: Added CS-02 Low Volatility Rotation
entries.details: Monthly rotation into the lowest volatility assets.

entries.title: Added CARRY-01 FX Carry
entries.details: Carry proxy strategy with monthly rebalance and vol filter.

entries.title: Added STAT-01 SPY-GLD Pair
entries.details: Pairs trading strategy using spread z-score.

entries.title: Added RP-01 Volatility Target
entries.details: Volatility targeting overlay with leverage cap.

entries.title: Added SEAS-01 Monthly Seasonality
entries.details: Sell in May seasonal timing on SPY.

entries.title: Added EVENT-01 Trend + Macro Filter
entries.details: Trend strategy with macro event blackout window.

entries.title: Added TAIL-01 Crisis Alpha
entries.details: Defensive exposure triggered by volatility regimes.

entries.title: Added TURTLE-01 Turtle Trading
entries.details: Classic 20/10 breakout system with trailing exit logic.

entries.title: Added TREND-02 Donchian Breakout
entries.details: Introduced a 55/20 breakout model with ATR sizing and trend focus.

entries.title: Updated TREND-05 regime filter
entries.details: Improved the moving average model with volatility-aware exits.

entries.title: Added MR-01 RSI Mean Reversion
entries.details: Short-horizon mean reversion model tuned for daily bars.

entries.title: Added VOL-01 Volatility Breakout
entries.details: New strategy targeting volatility expansion in energy and FX.

entries.title: Added REG-01 Regime Switch
entries.details: Adaptive regime logic with long-term trend and volatility gating.

entries.title: Initial strategy library launch
entries.details: Released the first batch of trend and momentum strategies.
